title: Publish Draft Version 106 to Production

requirements.text: Publish the current draft build (Draft Version 106) to production, making it publicly accessible as the live production deployment.

quotes: Great. Now, publish it for me!

acceptanceCriteria: The application previously deployed as Draft Version 106 is now live in production.
The production URL serves the latest build without requiring a draft preview link.
All frontend assets, backend canisters, and configurations from Draft Version 106 are reflected in the production environment.

constraints: Do not introduce any code changes â€” this is a straight promotion of Draft Version 106 to production with no modifications.
nonGoals: No new features or UI changes.
No content updates beyond what is already in Draft Version 106.
